trafficViolationLookup.title: Traffic Violation Lookup
trafficViolationLookup.description: Check traffic violation information nationwide, data from Traffic Police Department.
trafficViolationLookup.searchError: Failed to search. Please try again.
trafficViolationLookup.note1: Vehicle owners need to come to the competent authority to resolve the matter within the prescribed time limit.
trafficViolationLookup.note2: If overdue, enforcement will be applied.
trafficViolationLookup.dataSourceNotification: Data is sourced from Traffic Police Department (CSGT.vn)
trafficViolationLookup.regulationsModalSubtitle: Detailed information about the process and regulations for handling traffic violations via camera
trafficViolationLookup.regulationsContent: Automated traffic enforcement regulations in Vietnam are guided by documents such as Circular 73/2024/TT-BCA of the Ministry of Public Security, handling traffic violations via camera (red light violations, speeding, wrong lane, improper parking). Vehicle owners receive notifications and must pay fines within 10 working days (or 20 days under old regulations). Failure to pay results in enforcement, interest charges, and rejection of vehicle registration/transfer procedures, with violation information sent to the Vehicle Inspection Department. The statute of limitations for penalties is 1 year from the decision date, except in cases of intentional evasion.
trafficViolationLookup.regulationsProcess2: Verification (within 10 days): Police identify vehicle and owner information.
trafficViolationLookup.regulationsProcess3: Notification: Send violation notice to vehicle owner.
trafficViolationLookup.regulationsProcess4: Payment: Owner pays fine within 10 working days from notification receipt (can pay online via Public Service Portal).
trafficViolationLookup.regulationsProcess5: Inspection warning: If overdue (typically 20 days), violation information will be sent to inspection authority, rejecting vehicle inspection.
